message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $150 by its creators. Given its high quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than what it costs you. Considering its value to you, we're offering it for $120. This price not only reflects its worth but also ensures a fair deal for both parties. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the exceptional benefits of our product at an attractive price.
